question: Robert Lewandowski, who won the FIFA Best Men's Player Award, is from which country?
explanation:
Captain of the Poland National Football Team, Robert Lewandowski won The FIFA Best Men's Player Award 2020.
The Poland striker beat the previous winners Cristiano Ronaldo and Lionel Messi, who were in the short-list. He was also named the 2019-20 UEFA Men's Player of the Year in October. English footballer Lucy Bronze won the Best Womenâ€™s player award.
